title: Hi-Res audio lovers have a new friend in the OneOdio Monitor 60 pro monitor headphones
author: sponsored
article: OneOdio has a new set of headphones that audiophiles are going to dig. From its aesthetics to its pro audio performance, this is a pair of headphones that merits some attention, and its price alongside a Black Friday deal is sure to turn heads.

The new OneOdio Monitor 60 provide a premium set of professional monitoring headphones for under $100. OneOdio has used a pair of 50mm Neodymium drivers — almost an industry standard for high-fidelity audio — to deliver rich sound across a broad audio spectrum.
OneOdio has even received Hi-Res Audio verification, making it clear the headphones can live up to even demanding audio needs.

These headphones are designed to provide a frequency response range from 20Hz up to 40,000Hz, giving you impactful bass and mids as well as crisp treble. This is sound that’ll be ready for you whether you’re mixing, producing, recording, or just jamming out to your favorite tunes.
The headphones have a low impedance of 38 ohms and a high sensitivity, letting you make the most of them and get powerful sound without needing an expensive amplifier.

OneOdio includes three separate cables: a long, coiled cable with a 1/4-inch plug for the studio, a 3-meter straight cable for long runs to the TV, and a 1.2-meter straight cable with an in-line microphone for everyday use.
The headphones even have a port on each side, letting you run the cable out of whichever side you prefer.
The OneOdio Monitor 60 headphones are also designed with a comfortable, professional build quality alongside some convenience features and a striking look.
The headphones have a mesh grille on the outside and a grooved ring around that, giving off the effect of both a speaker grille and vinyl record.

The headphones have pivot- and tilt-adjustable ear cups to fit securely, and the leather-like earpads are soft and well cushioned to stay comfy for long-listening sessions while keeping the audio sealed in.
When you’re not using the headphones, they can fold up, and you can keep them in a carrying bag OneOdio includes with them.

OneOdio is already offering an impressive value with the Monitor 60 headphones, but it gets better for Black Friday. With coupon code “PROFFER60” at checkout on OneOdio’s site, you can save 20%. You can also get the headphones with a discount at Amazon or Amazon UK here.
